ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Ulysses URAP PFR average 10-min Electric Field Data
ResourceHeader.Description: This set of PFR (Plasma Frequency Receiver) data from the Ulysses URAP (Unified Radio and Plasma Waves) experiment contains averages of the average electric field intensities in 16 channels and 10-minute intervals via CDAWeb. The frequency spectra are determined from measurements on the X antenna of the URAP instrument in units of microvolt/Hz^0.5 for the frequency channel from 0.57 to 35 kHz.

AccessURL.Name: FTP access to CDFs at SPDF
AccessURL.Description: For ftp downloads of CDF formatted data from CDAWeb

AccessURL.Description: In CDF via HTTP from CDAWeb

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb
AccessURL.Description: CDAWeb interactive interface for subsets, plots and lists of data

AccessURL.Description: For ftp downloads of ASCII Ulysses URAP data
